title: Weird Sound and fps crackling
body:
Since the update 6.16 and 6.17 came out, when i play the game i'll constantly having fps drop and weird crackling noise(not from my headphones)

Did anyone having this problem also? Can someone help out pls{{item:3151}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you might be experiencing an issue with your computer, but first lets rule out any problem with league.

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if that helps.
